channel.title: Summoning glitch

item.title: Summoning glitch
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

ok atm i have a pi server and all but theres this glitch where u spawn a npc that can store items and then u dismiss it drop pouch and then click on the teleporter. Reason for this being, no summoning. Anyways so the kid gets into a no summoning zone and he picks up rare things ect. So then he kills himself and then goes back into the teleporter and clicks on store items and the bob interface comes up, I have been trying really hard to get this to stop. The code is below, Applied in action handler.

if (c.ateam == 1 && c.summoningnpcid == 0) {
c.storing = false;
c.lastsummon = -1;
c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
c.getItems().removeAllItems();
c.lastsummon = -1;
c.getPA().movePlayer(2107,3138, 0);
c.getItems().addItem(1349, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(590, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(311, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(301, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(15333, 1);
c.skullTimer = 999999999;
c.lastsummon = -1;
c.storing = false;
}

Read full topic
